attributes.action: Make public transport free for all under-18s
attributes.additional_details: Public transport costs are a big problem for children and their families.  The high fares are acting as a barrier for young people attending school, college and higher education.  It can also affect young adults socially and in accessing part time work.
attributes.background: We want the Government to introduce completely free public transport for all under 18s at all hours.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555173
